    <td class="tg-0pky">Demand-led, but demand regime either:<br><br>Wage-led:<br><br>- when saving propensity out of wages is relatively low<br>- Sensibility of investments from profit share is low<br>- Foreign trade is not important, domestic economy weakly connected to international trade<br><br><br>Profit-led:<br><br>- When saving propensity out of wage is relatively high<br>- Sensibility of investments from profit share is high<br>- Domestic economy is strongly connected to international trade<br><br><br></td>
    <td class="tg-0pky"><br>Wage-led demand: positively influenced by wage share<br>profit-led demand: negatively influenced by wage share<br><br><br>Wage-squeeze: utilization rate has a negative impact on the wage share<br>Profit-squeeze: utilization rate has a positive impact on the wage share<br><br></td>
